ingredients: +   1/4 cup unsalted butter,   +   3/4 cup white sugar, 3  eggs, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, 3   +   1/4 cups pastry flour, 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon, 1 teaspoon baking powder, 1 teaspoon instant espresso powder, 2 teaspoons grated orange zest,   +   1/2 cup chocolate chips,   +   1/2 cup dried apricots,   +   1/2 cup dried cranberries,   +   1/2 cup slivered almonds, 1  egg white, lightly beaten
nutrition: Total Fat 5g 6%, Saturated Fat 2g 11%, Cholesterol 28mg 9%, Sodium 33mg 1%, Total Carbohydrate 25g 9%, Dietary Fiber 3g 11%, Total Sugars 11g, Protein 3g, Vitamin C 0mg 2%, Calcium 25mg 2%, Iron 1mg 7%, Potassium 143mg 3%
